short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Notify and get notified about current world records.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Receive notifications and stay updated when a Twitch speedrunner is on the verge of surpassing their personal best or breaking the world record. This way, you can quickly join the chat and witness the momentous event live.
